name: Line-coding-scheme
tagline: Pankaj Redekar, Dnyaneshwar Shinde, Abhishek Zirange, Sudarshan Jadhav
body:
### About Line Coding Scheme
The project “Line coding schemes” is a desktop based system which helps the technical and non-technical user to understand the different types of line coding schemes with user interaction with generating diagrammatically.
In a present system it is difficult to new or a non-technical user to familiar with different types of line coding schemes. In this system user can interact with the concept of line coding user can input any text and it will convert into binary. On the basis of user choice the actual line coding technique will display graphically. At the end of the system operation user will familiar with the line coding schemes and how data will transfer using signal.  

### Automation
The “Line coding scheme” automates each and every activity of the manual system and increases its throughput. Thus the response time of the system is very less and it works very fast.

### Accuracy
The “Line coding schemes” provides the user a quick response with very accurate information regarding the data entered by user. 
User friendly
The software “Line coding schemes” has a very user friendly interface. Thus the users will feel very easy to work on it. This software provides accuracy along with a pleasant interface. Make the present manual system more iterative, speedy and user friendly.

### User friendly
The software “Line coding schemes” has a very user friendly interface. Thus the users will feel very easy to work on it. This software provides accuracy along with a pleasant interface. Make the present manual system more iterative, speedy and user friendly.
